name: Chicken and Fried Rice
ingredients: salt, pepper and rosemary to taste
instructions: Saute garlic and onion in oil until tender. Add chicken and spices and stir-fry until cooked. Add carrots and peas and stir-fry until tender, about 7 minutes (during last two minutes add eggs and stir constantly).
Stir in rice and soy sauce and heat through. Serve.
